summary: WHEN DRIVING AT NIGHT IN FOG HEAD LIGHT BEAMS PROJECTS  OFF A BRIGHT LIGHT. THE LIGHT IS SO BRIGHT THAT IT CAUSES THE DRIVER TO HAVE POOR VISIBILITY. TS. HEADLIGHT BEAMS PROJECT OFF A BRIGHT LIGHT. LIGHT BEAMS ARE REFLECTED UP DIRECTLY IN FRONT OF VEHICLE. THE LIGHT ILUMINATES THE FOG, AND VISIBILITY IS GREATLY REDUCED.  *AK
